question.title: problem with strings.xml fom different language folder
question.body:
I created an Android application that supports 2 languages, en and gr.

I have a language selection for the user.

When the phone is set up by default in Greek, then all is ok, but when the phone is set up in English, I am facing the bellow issue.

I am choosing the Greek language and all is ok, everything is in Greek, but when I am choosing a category, like restaurants, and I choose one restaurant from the lis,t gives me an empty view.

I noticed till I reach the Detailview.activity (details for a specific restaurant), I am getting the strings from strings.xml in the GR folder, but after I am getting the string from the default strings.xml, which is English.

So when I am doing this: if ( name.equals(getString(R.string.akamata) )

String name = Greek restaurant name that I am passing from the user click, but string akamata that is supposed to be taken from the strings.xml (GR folder) is from the strings.xml, which is English

can someone help?

To mention at the mainActivity if i will do the above if everything is ok, this is happening only when i am going to the Detailsview.activity activity that will show details from user selection. ALso yhis is happening now that I upgrade the targetSdkVersion to 35

question_comments.body: You should use individual restaurants IDs instead of comparing strings in arbitrary languages.
Please provide enough code so others can better understand or reproduce the problem.
